tool_description:
Unveil the market dynamics with 'Product Price History', an intuitive API delivering detailed price history of products at specific intervals like 8 hours, 1 day, and 1 week. Tailored for marketers, analysts, and e-commerce platforms, this API provides essential insights into pricing trends, helping you strategize and respond to the ever-changing market.

Whether tracking short-term fluctuations or long-term changes, 'Product Price History' offers valuable data for competitive analysis, marke...
name: Product Price History
title: Product Price History

api_list.name: price-history
api_list.description: Get product price history by country iso2 code and GTIN/ISBN and different barcodes

optional_parameters.name: last_x_months
optional_parameters.description: data for last X months, maximum 24 months
